constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: CONARA Name: Liverpool Road Conservation Area
NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Magnolia - 2m Reduction in height, 50cm lateral reduction to select lower limbs to reshape crown whilst maintaining aesthetic value & remove any deadwood. All cuts to be made to suitable growth points.T.2 Cherry - 2m Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.3 Cherry - 2m Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points, crown lift to 2.5m from ground level over public footpath & deadwood.T.4 Cherry - Fell.T.5 Magnolia - 3-4m Reduction in height & reshape to suitable growth points.T.6 Cherry - 2m Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points, crown lift to 2.5m from ground level over public footpath & deadwood.T.7 Cherry - 2m Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points, crown lift to 2.5m from ground level over public footpath & deadwood.T.8 Cherry - 2m Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points, crown lift to 2.5m from ground level over public footpath & deadwood..
